name: leetpilot-extension
description: AI-powered code completion and educational hints for LeetCode with BYOK (Bring Your Own Key) privacy

scripts.build:extension: npm run build && npm run copy:extension
scripts.copy:extension: cp manifest.json dist/ && cp -r background dist/ && cp -r content dist/ && cp -r popup dist/ && cp -r icons dist/
scripts.package: npm run clean && npm run build:prod && npm run create:zip
scripts.package:dev: npm run build:dev && npm run create:zip:dev
scripts.package:staging: npm run build:staging && npm run create:zip:staging
scripts.validate:all: npm run validate:icons && npm run validate:package
scripts.prepare:store: npm run validate:all && npm run package && echo 'Chrome Web Store package ready: leetpilot-extension.zip'
scripts.prepare:dev: npm run package:dev && echo 'Development package ready: leetpilot-extension-dev.zip'
scripts.prepare:staging: npm run package:staging && echo 'Staging package ready: leetpilot-extension-staging.zip'
scripts.build:report: node scripts/build.js production chrome && echo 'Build report available in dist/build-report.json'
